document_name: Regulation on operators' emission allowance in the EU's transaction system with allowances.
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ISL/2013/ISL-2013-01-01-Regulation on operators' emission allowance in the EU's transaction system with allowances._406cee7f1d9e29473799bb300e491c2c.pdf
document_description: The objective of this Regulation is to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and to ensure that operators of establishments within the scope of the EU Emissions Trading Scheme meet the conditions for participation in the system. This Regulation applies to the licensing allowance of operators falling within the scope of the EU trading system with allowances pursuant to Art. Act no. 70/2012 on climate, ie. on the conditions for issuing an emission permit, form and substance of a permit to issue, a procedure for issuing a permit to issue and changes to a permit to discharge. This Regulation was amended in September 2013 for operational reasons.
